message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in. It's valued at no less than $8000 to me, but I'm open to negotiation. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $10000? I'm confident it's worth the investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I'm willing to pay that price, but no more.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. While I value the product at $8000, I'm willing to come down to $7500 to make this deal work. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm willing to pay, but I still think $7000 is the most I'm willing to go. Can you meet me in the middle at $7250?
